Itinerary Overview (12 Weeks)

1. Southeast Asia (3 Weeks)

  • Destinations: Thailand (7 days), Vietnam (7 days), Cambodia (4 days), Laos (3 days).
  • Highlights: Temples of Angkor, Halong Bay, Luang Prabang.
  • Visas: Visa-free/on arrival for most passports (e.g., Thailand 30-day exemption, Vietnam e-visa).
  • Cost: ~$40‚Äì$50/day (budget hostels, street food, buses).

2. India & Nepal (2 Weeks)

  • Destinations: Delhi, Jaipur, Agra (India: 7 days), Kathmandu & Himalayas (Nepal: 7 days).
  • Visas: India e-visa (~$50), Nepal visa on arrival (~$30).
  • Cost: ~$35‚Äì$45/day.

3. Middle East (1 Week)

  • Destinations: Dubai (3 days), Jordan (4 days: Petra, Wadi Rum).
  • Visas: UAE visa-free for many (check), Jordan visa on arrival (~$60).
  • Cost: ~$70‚Äì$100/day (splurge in Dubai, budget in Jordan).

4. Europe (2.5 Weeks)

  • Destinations: Italy (Rome, Florence), France (Paris), Spain (Barcelona).
  • Visas: Schengen visa (apply in advance; allows 90 days in 26 countries).
  • Cost: ~$80‚Äì$120/day (hostels, trains, free walking tours).

5. East Africa (2 Weeks)

  • Destinations: Kenya (Masai Mara, 5 days), Tanzania (Zanzibar, Serengeti, 7 days).
  • Visas: Kenya e-visa (~$50), Tanzania e-visa (~$100).
  • Cost: ~$60‚Äì$80/day (safaris are pricey; book group tours).

6. South Africa (1 Week)

  • Destinations: Cape Town, Garden Route.
  • Visas: Visa-free for many (check).
  • Cost: ~$50‚Äì$70/day.

7. South America (2 Weeks)

  • Destinations: Brazil (Rio, 5 days), Peru (Machu Picchu, 7 days).
  • Visas: Brazil visa-free for many, Peru visa-free.
  • Cost: ~$50‚Äì$70/day.

Visa Tips

  • Apply for Schengen, India, and East Africa e-visas in advance.
  • Check if your passport allows visa-free entry to the UAE, South Africa, Brazil, etc.
  • Carry USD cash for visas on arrival (e.g., Jordan, Nepal).

  • Accommodation/Food/Transport: ~$10,000‚Äì$13,000

    • India/Nepal: $700
    • Middle East: $700
    • Europe: $2,000
    • Africa: $1,500
    • South America: $1,000
  • Flights: ~$3,000‚Äì$5,000 (book multi-city tickets or budget airlines; use Skyscanner).
  • Visas/Insurance: ~$500‚Äì$800.
  • Activities: ~$1,500 (safaris, Machu Picchu, Petra).

Total: ~$15,000‚Äì$20,000 (mid-range travel).

Logistics

  • Health: Yellow fever vaccine for Africa; malaria prophylaxis.
  • Transport: Use trains/buses in Europe and Asia; internal flights in Africa/S. America.
  • Insurance: Get comprehensive travel insurance (e.g., World Nomads).
